TextBlock.Text: BETULA: I've decided to name this planet <color=orange>Glacial Abyss!</color>!
ADONSONIA: I like it! Clearly you do as well, if your enthusiasm is anything to go by.
BETULA: Oh, I should clarify. The first exclamation is actually part of the name, <color=orange>Glacial Abyss!</color>.
ALNUS: All things considered, that is not the worst planet name that has been chosen for this project.
